name: Simple future tense
description: A survey to practice our learning about simple future tense

questions.name: Mary: "I am about to fall asleep. I need to wake up!" Clare: "I ______ you some coffee."
I’ll __________ soccer this afternoon.
What sentence is not in simple future tense?

options.name: I will study for the test

questions.name: What is the short form of will?
Select the option that fill correctly the blank space: I am ____________ play soccer tomorrow
Select the option(s) that fit the blank: She _________________ Canada this weekend.
Select the option that fill the blanks correctly: ____ they _______ go to the party tomorrow?
What is the short form of will not?

name: Simple Present
description: This survey is about the simple present tense, when and how to use it.

questions.name: _____ in the shower?
_________ every morning
He ____ soccer
She _____ english in Espoolingo
She _____ a skirt on sundays
You _____ tomorrow
I ____ a plan
She  _____ to the concert
He ____ a lot sometimes
Select the interrogative form of "She likes sunny days"

name: Choose subject
description: Select correct subject for each sentence

questions.name: ____ is happy!
____ am happy!
____ are happy!

answered_questions.name: ____ is happy!
____ am happy!
____ are happy!

questions.name: ____ is happy!
____ am happy!
____ are happy!

answered_questions.name: ____ is happy!
____ am happy!
____ are happy!

questions.name: ____ are happy!
____ am happy!
____ is happy!
When __________ (you / join) the company? Ten months ago.
__________ (you / ever / work) in Europe?
That's the worst presentation __________ (I / see) in my live?
Sales __________ (rise) in 1993 but then __________ fall in 1996?
Ryan is still working. He __________ (not / finish) his homework yet?
